analyzed: suprabhātastotram
śrī harṣa deva bhūpati viracitam
stutam api sura saṅghaiḥ siddha gandharva yakṣaiḥ
rdivi bhuvi su vicitraiḥ stotra vāgbhiḥ yati īśaiḥ
aham api kṛta śaktiḥ naumi saṃbuddham āryam

original: nabhasi garuḍayāte kiṃ na yānti dvirephāḥ || 1 ||
analyzed: nabhasi garuḍa yāte kim na yānti dvirephāḥ
kṣapita durita pakṣaḥ kṣīṇa niḥśeṣa doṣaḥ
dravita kanaka varṇaḥ phulla padma āyata akṣaḥ
su rucira pariveṣaḥ suprabhā maṇḍala śrīḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
madana bala vijetuḥ kāpatha uccheda kartu
sama sukha phala dātuḥ bhettuḥ ajñāna śailam
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
asura sura narāṇām yaḥ ugrajanmā agradevaḥ
sakala bhuvana dhātau loka sṛṣṭyā eka śabdaḥ
svapiti manuja dhātā abjayoniḥ svayambhū
rdaśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
udayagiri taṭa sthaḥ vidruma cheda tāmra
s timira nikara hantā cakṣuḥ ekam prajānām
raviḥ api mada lolaḥ sarvathā saḥ api
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
dvirada daśana pāṇḍuḥ śītaraśmiḥ śaśāṅka
s tilakaḥ iva rajanyāḥ sarva cūḍāmaṇiḥ yaḥ
a vigata mada rāgaḥ sarvathā saḥ api suptaḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
amala kamala yoniḥ saḥ upi brahmā
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
himagiri śikhara sthaḥ sarpa yajña upavītī
tripura dahana dakṣaḥ vyāghra carma uttarīyaḥ
saha giri vara putryā saḥ upi suptaḥ triśūlī
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
jvalita kuliśa pāṇiḥ durjayaḥ dānavānām
surapatiḥ api śacyāḥ vibhrame mūḍha cetāḥ
a niśi niśi prasuptaḥ kāma paṅke nimagnaḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
hariḥ api cira suptaḥ garbha vāsaiḥ amuktaḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
smara śara dalita aṅgaḥ saḥ api suptaḥ hutāśo
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
huma śaśi kumuda ābhaḥ madya pāna aruṇa akṣaḥ
dṛḍha kaṭhina bhuja aṅgaḥ lāṅgalī śakti hastaḥ
bale iha śayitā usau revatī kaṇṭha lagnaḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
gaja mukha daśana ekaḥ sarvatas vighna hantā
vigalita mada vāriḥ ṣaṭpada ākīrṇa gaṇḍaḥ
gaṇapatiḥ api suptaḥ vāruṇī pāna mattaḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
atasi kusuma nīlaḥ yasya śaktiḥ kara agre
nava kamala vapuṣmān ṣaṇmukhaḥ krauñca hantā
nitya suptaḥ kumāraḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
aśana vasana hīnā bhāvyamānā virūpā
alam akhila vighātaiḥ preta vat dagdha dehāḥ
ubhaya gati vihīnāḥ te pi nagnāḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
ṛṣayaḥ iha mahāntaḥ vatsa bhṛgu aṅgira ādyāḥ
kratu pulaha vasiṣṭhāḥ vyāsa vālmīki gargāḥ
para yuvati vilāsaiḥ mohitāḥ te api suptāḥ
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
yama varuṇa kuberāḥ yakṣa daitya uraga indrāḥ
divi bhuvi gagane vā lokapālāḥ tathā anye
yuvati mada kaṭākṣaiḥ vīṃkṣitāḥ te pi suptā
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
bhava jalanidhi magnā moha jāla āvṛta aṅgā
manu kapila kaṇādāḥ bhrāmitāḥ mūḍha cittāḥ
sama sukha parihīnāḥ suptā
daśabala tava nityam su prabhātam prabhātam
ajñāna nidrā rajanī tamasi prasuptā
tṛṣṇā viśāla śayane viṣaya upadhāne
kāle śubha aśubha phalam parikīryamāṇe
jāgarti yaḥ satatam eva namaḥ astu tasmai
tīrtheṣu go kula śatāni pibanti toyam
tṛptim vrajanti na ca tat kṣayam abhyupaiti
tadvat mune kavi śataiḥ api saṃstutasya
na kṣīyate guṇa nidhiḥ guṇa sāgarasya
su prabhātam tava ekasya jñāna unmīlita cakṣuṣaḥ
ajñāna timira andhānām nityam astamitaḥ raviḥ  /

original: punaḥ prabhātaṃ punarutthito raviḥ punaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ punareva śarvarī |
analyzed: punar prabhātam punar utthitaḥ raviḥ punar śaśāṅkaḥ punar eva śarvarī

original: mṛtyurjarā janma tathaiva he mune gatāgataṃ mūḍhajano na buddhyate || 22 ||
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ jarā janma tathā eva he mune gatāgatam mūḍha janaḥ na buddhyate  /
su prabhātam su nakṣatram śriyā pratyabhinanditam

original: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ va praṇamāmi dine dine || 23 ||
analyzed: buddham dharmam ca saṅgham praṇamāmi dine dine
stutvā lokagurum mahā muni varam saddharma puṇya udgamam
nirdvandvam hata rāga dveṣa timiram śānta indriyam nispṛham

original: yatpuṇyaṃ samupārjitaṃ khalu mayā tenaiva loko'khilaṃ
analyzed: yat puṇyam samupārjitam khalu mayā tena eva loka ukhilam
pratyūṣa stuti harṣitaḥ daśabale śraddhām parām vindatām
śrī harṣa deva bhūpati viracitam daśabalasya suprabhāta stotram samāptam
